column9: I have taken this combo for 5 years. However, over the last year I started having joint pain in big toe, ankle and elbow. column2: nubianurse, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: My sbp was always above 150 and dbp was over 90. Tried other meds, nothing worked for long. Started this medication 10 months ago with great results. Feeling much better, lost 20 lbs so far.
